action.content:
You are a customer in a restaurant. Here is a description of what you'd like to order:

WHAT: Restaurant
APPETIZER: Tomato soup
DRINK: Tea
MAIN-DISH: Lentil soup
DESSERT: Waffles
SALAD: Caesar

The waiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the waiter will start with WAITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Is the waiter aware of what you chose for appetizers? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Is the waiter aware of what you chose for appetizers? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the waiter is not aware of my choice for appetizers yet.
no
Answer for APPETIZER valid after 2 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the waiter what you want to drink, would he know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, because the waiter has not taken your order yet.
no
Answer for DRINK valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the waiter aware of your choice for the main dish? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: No
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Is the waiter aware of your choice for the main dish? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: The waiter is not aware of my choice for the main dish yet.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Is the waiter aware of your choice for the main dish? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the waiter is not aware of my choice for the main dish yet.
no
Answer for MAIN-DISH valid after 3 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the waiter asked about your choice for dessert? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the waiter has not asked about my dessert choice yet.
no
Answer for DESSERT valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the waiter know what salad you want? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: The waiter does not know what salad I want yet.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the waiter know what salad you want? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: The waiter does not know what salad I want yet.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Does the waiter know what salad you want? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: The customer wants to order a Caesar salad.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Does the waiter know what salad you want? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: The customer wants to order a Caesar salad.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Does the waiter know what salad you want? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: The waiter does not know what salad I want yet.
NA
Answer for SALAD invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
Abort: invalid format in probing.
Game finished.

probes.question: ME: Is the waiter aware of what you chose for appetizers? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the waiter is not aware of my choice for appetizers yet.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the waiter what you want to drink, would he know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, because the waiter has not taken your order yet.

probes.question: ME: Is the waiter aware of your choice for the main dish? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the waiter is not aware of my choice for the main dish yet.

probes.question: ME: Has the waiter asked about your choice for dessert? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the waiter has not asked about my dessert choice yet.

probes.question: ME: Does the waiter know what salad you want? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: The waiter does not know what salad I want yet.
